item.title: 14 Terrible People, And Why You Should Avoid Them
item.description: By Cracked Plasticians  Published: July 26th, 2019
item.abstract: Cracked pays people to make smart memes. Visit the Photoplasty and Pictofacts Workshop to get in on it. Annoying people are unavoidable, and they come in lots of different flavors. So we asked our plasticians to come up with trading card-style memes to help organize irritating people into tidy categories. You should be able to recognize a number of these archetypes, just among the people you interact with in your daily life. If not, it's quite possible you're the insufferable one.
